Title: SQL Injection
Description: Potential SQL Injection Vulnerability in silverstripe.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.0.0 up to 3.0.13, all versions starting from 3.1.0 before 3.1.13
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.0.0, all versions after 3.0.13 before 3.1.0, all versions starting from 3.1.13
